properties.name: fillcolor
properties.description: What color must be added to the interior of the component

properties.name: bordervariant
properties.description: Where the border must be added on the top and bottom edges of the component

properties.name: elevation
properties.description: How raised the component should appear in relation to its surrounding.

properties.name: paddinghorizontal
properties.description: How much padding should be added to the section on the left and right edges.

properties.name: paddingvertical
properties.description: How much padding should be added to the section on the top and bottom edges.
